    • getOutgoingBatch

      PartitionOutgoingBatch getOutgoingBatch(int index)
      Get PartitionOutgoingBatch based on the fact that there can be > 1 Partitioner
      Parameters:
      index -
      Returns:
      PartitionOutgoingBatch that matches index within Partitioner. This method can return null if index does not fall within boundary of this Partitioner
